### COVID Project README

This a reposetory which contains code and work done for the covid undergraduate reasearch project during the fall 2020 semester. 

In completaion of this research a visualization dashboard was made and can be viewed here (please allow a few minutes for the page to load, dont be discouraged by the blank page):
https://setharreola.shinyapps.io/covid_app/

This project was also presented by myself and my team to CSUF faculty and Orange county reporters, this presentation can be viewed here: https://youtu.be/dzJqqdOd2ps
